items.name: LAPTOP CASE
items.description: Handmade out of top-grain leather with a wool interior, the Monument Laptop Case provides rugged protection for a laptop as well as additional pockets for small daily carry items.

items.name: NAVIGATOR LEATHER NOTEBOOK
items.description: The Navigator Leather Notebook features the best of our craft: a minimalist design, built refillable, and handmade with top-grain leather.

items.name: LOOP LEATHER KEYCHAIN
items.description: Easily and conveniently store your keys. A meticulously cut leather loop is  handcrafted around a metal key ring.
